ComicInfo.Title: Cobra Nation: Part Three
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Cobra Nation: Part Three: The Baroness and Zarana test Dawn's combat skills. Cover Girl returns to duty, her voice now a rasp due to her throat injury. Jinx is confronted by Akane of the Red Ninjas. Bombstrike breaks into the remains of the Red Shadows base in Olliestan and finds two Cobra scientists rebuilding it, who take her prisoner. Jane goes to see Claire only for Claire to pull a gun on her. Cover Girl and Lady Jaye visit Mrs. Craig and inform her how her daughter was actually Shooter, a member of G.I. Joe, and are finally able to share some of the true details of her death.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 00:15:00. [CVDB528381] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:40:34. [Issue ID 1562834]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Cassandra Knox],Silent Master [Akane],Mrs. Craig,Ellen,Jane,Jinx,Scarlett,Lady Jaye,Bombstrike],Granny Demon [Obake Obaasan],Dawn Moreno,Shooter (flashback),Cobra [Dr. Sidney Biggles-Jones,G.I. Joe [Cover Girl,Claire Hauser,Zarana,Baroness
